# geniereader

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of geniereader is to read csv files generated from the Genie-III machine (as personally used by our group) & conduct basica analysis and reports. 

## Installation


You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("moshejasper/geniereader")
```
